title: Landing page loads correctly
description: Verify that the landing page displays with correct branding, dark theme, animated headlines, dual CTA buttons, and feature highlights

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page URL
Check that the page background and elements use the premium dark theme
Verify that the animated headlines are visible and cycling correctly
Confirm that there are two call-to-action buttons and they are clickable
Verify that the feature highlights section displays the expected features
Check SEO metadata is correctly set for the landing page

title: Signup with Free plan flow
description: Verify that a new user can signup with the Free plan, and is correctly assigned the Free tier subscription

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Fill in valid email and password
Select the Free plan option
Submit the signup form
Check that user account is created with Free tier subscription
Verify user is redirected to dashboard

title: Signup with Paid plan flow (Monthly)
description: Verify that a user can signup and complete payment via Stripe for the Monthly plan, assigning correct subscription tier

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Fill in valid email and password
Select the Monthly paid plan
Complete the payment on Stripe checkout page
Check that user account is created with Monthly tier subscription
Verify user is redirected to dashboard
Confirm subscription status is active

title: Login with correct credentials
description: Check login is successful with correct email and password

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid registered email and correct password
Click login button
Check login is successful and user is redirected to dashboard

title: Login with incorrect credentials
description: Check login fails with invalid email or password and shows error message

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email or incorrect password
Click login button
Verify that login fails and error message is displayed

title: Forgot password flow
description: Verify users can request password reset and successfully reset their password using emailed link

steps.description: Navigate to forgot password page
Submit a registered email address
Check that reset email is sent via Resend email service
Receive the reset password link and navigate to reset password page
Enter and confirm new password
Submit the reset password form
Verify that password is updated and user can login with new password

title: Dashboard Quick Estimate Builder calculates estimates accurately
description: Verify that the estimate builder inputs correctly calculate equipment, materials, labor, discount and display accurate total estimates for all tiers in real-time

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard
Enter equipment cost: 1000
Enter materials cost: 500
Enter labor hours: 10
Enter labor rate: 70
Enter discount percentage: 10
Verify the standard, priority, and emergency pricing are calculated and displayed correctly according to the pricing rules

title: Copy to clipboard functionality
description: Verify that clicking copy to clipboard copies the correctly formatted estimate text and triggers user feedback

steps.description: Build an estimate on the dashboard with valid inputs
Click the copy to clipboard button
Check that the clipboard contains the formatted estimate text
Verify a confirmation message or feedback is shown to the user

title: PDF export for Free tier user includes watermark
description: Verify that Free tier users can export estimates as PDFs with the expected watermark branding

steps.description: Login as a Free tier user
Create an estimate on the dashboard
Trigger PDF export
Verify that the downloaded PDF contains the estimate details and visible watermark

title: PDF export for Paid tier user includes professional branding
description: Verify that Monthly and Annual subscribers export clean branded PDFs without watermark, and Annual tier includes user logo if uploaded

steps.description: Login as a Monthly subscriber
Create an estimate on the dashboard
Trigger PDF export and verify no watermark appears
Logout and login as Annual subscriber with uploaded company logo
Create an estimate and export to PDF
Verify that the PDF includes the user uploaded logo and professional branding without watermark

title: Free tier estimate usage limits enforced
description: Verify that Free users are limited to creating 3 estimates per month and receive appropriate messaging after limit is reached

steps.description: Login as Free tier user with 0 estimates used this month
Create and save 3 estimates sequentially
After third estimate, verify that further estimate creation is blocked or disabled
Check user receives notification regarding monthly estimate limit

title: Saved estimate templates accessible to Monthly and Annual subscribers only
description: Verify that only Monthly and Annual subscriptions can save and load estimate templates, and Free users cannot access this feature

steps.description: Login as Free tier user and attempt to save an estimate template
Verify that save template functionality is unavailable or disabled
Login as Monthly subscriber
Create and save an estimate template
Verify template is saved and can be loaded later

title: User settings update company name and upload logo
description: Verify that users can update their company name and upload a logo file, with file validation, and changes persist for branding on PDFs

steps.description: Login and navigate to user settings page
Update the company name input field
Attempt to upload an invalid file type as logo
Verify that invalid file upload is rejected with error message
Upload a valid logo image file
Save the settings
Verify that company name and logo are saved and reflected in user profile and PDF export branding

title: Stripe webhook updates subscription status and triggers email
description: Validate that Stripe webhook events correctly update user subscription status in system and send confirmation emails via Resend

steps.description: Simulate Stripe webhook event for subscription payment succeeded
Check that user's subscription status is updated to active
Verify that a subscription confirmation email is sent to the user

title: Password reset email triggers appropriately and reset succeeds
description: Verify that password reset emails are sent on request, reset links function correctly, and password is updated

steps.description: Request password reset for registered email
Verify reset email is sent with correct content
Use reset link to access reset password page
Submit new valid password
Verify password is updated and user can login with new password

title: Dashboard responsiveness and accessibility
description: Verify all dashboard components, including Quick Estimate Builder and Saved Estimates tab, are responsive and accessible per WCAG AA+ standards, including keyboard navigation

steps.description: Resize browser window to various screen sizes including mobile
Verify UI components adapt layout properly without overflow or clipping
Navigate dashboard using keyboard only
Verify focus outlines are visible and all interactive elements are reachable
Use accessibility tools to verify ARIA labels and contrast ratios meet WCAG AA+ standards

title: Estimate data is not stored server-side
description: Confirm that estimate data is never stored on the server and all calculations and storage happen client-side to comply with privacy policies

steps.description: Create and save estimates and templates using dashboard
Inspect network traffic and verify no estimate data is sent to or stored on server endpoints
Confirm saved templates are handled only within authorized mechanisms for Monthly/Annual tiers

title: Pricing page displays correct tier comparison and Stripe payment links
description: Verify that the pricing page shows accurate comparison of Free, Monthly, and Annual tiers and the Stripe payment links function correctly

steps.description: Navigate to the pricing page
Verify that each subscription tier is listed with correct features and limits
Verify that Stripe payment links are present and clickable for Monthly and Annual plans
Click payment link and confirm navigation to Stripe checkout page
